description: Fighters, Paladins, Mages, and Dark Elves who continue to travel to save the world have decided to purchase the latest type of armor after a difficult time in the dungeon. But the armor looks exactly the same as it used to be. What is its performance?

titles.title: Bikini Armor wa Bikini Armor de Atte Bikini de wa Nai
It`s Not a Bikini If It`s Armor
Ne pas confondre armure-bikini et bikini
ビキニアーマーはビキニアーマーであってビキニではない
